dict.acceptation: 考虑，考察；照顾，关心；报酬；尊敬；

sent.orig: First, this purchase needs from the entire drink profession consideration from the fruit juice profession consideration?
sent.trans: 一是这次收购需要从整个饮料行业考虑还是从果汁行业考虑？

sent.orig: I hoep to read some helpful books which require consideration, even focused consideration.
sent.trans: 我要看一些有用的东西，我要看一下需要思考，更需要集中精神才能看的书。

sent.orig: Money ought to be a consideration in marriage-but never the consideration.
sent.trans: 婚姻中是应该考虑钱的问题，但是不是“最”应该考虑到问题。

sent.orig: By over-all consideration we mean consideration that embraces the 600 million people of our country.
sent.trans: 这里所说的统筹兼顾，是指对于六亿人口的统筹兼顾。

sent.orig: Too much consideration leads to hesitation; while too little consideration leads to rashness.
sent.trans: 思谋过分就容易犹豫，思谋不足就容易鲁莽。
